nodes.text: Ryan K. Brooks is a software developer, freelance writer for Fantasy Flight Games' line of Star Wars roleplaying games, as well as an artist, co-founder, designer, editor, and writer of FandomComics.com. He was also a play tester for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game line. While contributing to FandomComics.com from 2005 until 2012, Ryan made Star Wars fan comics and RPG material.
